sprint.name: Sprint 15
sprint.goal: Complete user authentication and basic dashboard functionality

stories.title: User Login with OAuth
stories.description: As a user, I want to log in using my company credentials so that I can access the application securely
acceptance_criteria: OAuth flow redirects to company SSO
Failed login shows appropriate error message

stories.title: Dashboard Widget Framework
stories.description: As a user, I want to see customizable dashboard widgets so that I can monitor key metrics at a glance

stories.title: Password Reset Flow
stories.description: As a user, I want to reset my password if I forget it so that I can regain access to my account
acceptance_criteria: User can request password reset via email

stories.title: API Rate Limiting
stories.description: As a system administrator, I want API endpoints to have rate limiting so that the system remains stable under heavy load
acceptance_criteria: Rate limits are configurable per endpoint
Rate limit headers included in responses
Different limits for authenticated vs anonymous users
blockers: Waiting for infrastructure team to provision Redis cluster
